lead_paragraph: In a game halted twice by power failures, goals by Gregg Berhalter and Landon Donovan propelled the Los Angeles Galaxy into the M.L.S.’s championship match next Sunday.
snippet: In a game halted twice by power failures, goals by Gregg Berhalter and Landon Donovan propelled the Los Angeles Galaxy into the M.L.S.’s championship match next Sunday.
